Burst.display_help: Quickly fires a Burst of rounds at a single target at very long range. Damage is average, but the fire rate is fast. Can also reduce the target's defense. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Fast
Burst.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the Assault Rifle.

Slug.display_help: Fires a single Slug at a targeted foe. Firing a single Slug is slower than firing a Burst, but deals more damage, is longer range, and can knock down foes. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Buckshot.display_help: Good at close range. Fires a cone of Buckshot pellets and can knock some foes down. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

M30_Grenade.display_help: Launches a Grenade at long range from beneath the barrel of your Assault Rifle. This explosion affects all within the blast radius, and can knock them back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

Flamethrower.display_help: Spews forth a cone of flames from underneath the barrel of your assault rifle, setting foes on fire. Very accurate and very deadly at medium range. Damage: Extreme(DoT) Recharge: Slow
Flamethrower.display_target_help: The Flamethrower has set you on fire and you are burning.

Force_Field_Generator.display_help: You can build a Force Field Generator Drone. The Drone will generate a Dispersion Bubble that gives all nearby allies increased Defense against all attacks including Psionic. The Dispersion Bubble also protects allies from Immobilization, Disorient, and Hold effects. The Done will follow you and can be buffed and healed or even destroyed like any friendly entity. However, the Drone is not a Henchman and cannot be given commands. You can only ever have one Force Field Generator. Recharge: Very Slow
Force_Field_Generator.display_short_help: Place Drone: PBAoE, Team +DEF, +Res(Hold, Immobilize, Disorient)

Full_Auto.display_help: Opens up your assault rifle on Full Auto to lay down a massive spray of bullets at your target. Although very slow to reload, damage from this attack is massive, shredding all targets within the narrow cone of effect. There's a chance you may land a lucky shot for extra damage. Damage: Superior(DoT), Recharge: Slow

Triage_Beacon.display_help: You can plant a Triage Beacon into the ground. The Beacon is immobile, but it emits a powerful healing aura. The Regeneration Rate of you, or your allies, will be greatly increased as long as you are near the Triage Beacon. The Beacon is invulnerable. Recharge: Very Long

Seeker_Drones.display_help: You create two Seeker Drones. These Seeker Drones will follow you until they detect an enemy and then they will zero in on their targets and detonate on impact. The small explosive flash of energy does only minor damage, but the concussion can weaken foes. Affected targets will have reduced Damage, Accuracy and Perception and may even be Disoriented for a short while. You can only ever have Two Seeker Drones out at one time and they can be destroyed by your foes. Recharge: Long
Seeker_Drones.display_short_help: Summon Seekers: Ranged Disorient, -DMG, -ACC, -Perception, Low DMG(Energy)

Ignite.display_help: Sprays a targeted location with accelerant from your flamethrower, igniting the location. Any foes that pass through the flames will be burned. Great for blocking doorways and small passages. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Fast
Ignite.display_target_help: You have been ignited! You are burning.

Resistance.display_help: Villains are resistant to lethal, smashing, energy, fire and cold damage.
Resistance.display_short_help: Auto Res Lethal, Smash, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative Energy, Toxic, Radiation

Swipe.display_help: Two quick Swipes with your claws. Does minor lethal damage, but has a quick recharge rate. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

Strike.display_help: You perform a deadly Strike with your claws. This is a basic attack that deals a moderate amount of lethal damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

Focus.display_help: Projects a burst of Focused power over a short distance. Focus deals high lethal damage and can possibly knock down your foe. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Slash.display_help: You Slash at your foe with your claws, dealing a good amount of lethal damage, but with a longer recharge rate than Swipe or Strike . This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Slash.display_target_help: The claws have reduced your Defenses.

Focused_Fighting.display_help: You become more evasive to melee and ranged attacks. Your Focus also offers you resistance to Confuse effects and allows you to perceive stealthy foes.
Focused_Fighting.display_target_help: You become more evasive to melee and ranged attacks. Your Focus also offers you resistance to Confuse effects and allows you to perceive stealthy foes.

Assassins_Claw.display_help: A signature Stalker attack. This attack does moderate damage on its own as a frontal attack. However, if it is executed while you are Hidden, this attack will do tremendous lethal damage, as you impale your unsuspecting foe. This attack may be interrupted if you move or are attacked while executing this power. Damage: Special, Recharge: Slow

Shockwave.display_help: Projects a Shockwave of focused power that can travel a short distance. Shockwave travels in a wide arc in front of you dealing moderate lethal damage and, possibly knocking back foes. If executed while hidden, all affected targets have a chance to be hit with a Critical for extra damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

Inner_Focus.display_help: You become more evasive to melee, ranged attacks, area effect attacks and cone shaped attacks. Your Focus also offers you resistance to Confuse effects and allows you to perceive stealthy foes.
Inner_Focus.display_target_help: You become more evasive to melee, ranged attacks, area effect attacks and cone shaped attacks. Your Focus also offers you resistance to Confuse effects and allows you to perceive stealthy foes.

Eviscerate.display_help: You spin and slash violently, Eviscerating all foes in a wide arc in front of you. If executed while hidden, all affected targets have a chance to be hit with a Critical for extra lethal damage, however, there is also a very small chance you may land a Critical hit with Eviscerate, even if you are not Hidden. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

Quickness.display_help: Your Quick reflexes allow you to move faster than normal, as well as resist slow effects. This power is always on and permanently increases your attack rate and movement speed.

Elude.display_help: You can improve your reflexes, making yourself so quick you can Elude almost any attack, be it ranged, melee, or area effect. Your running speed and jumping height are also increased. When Elude wears off, you are left drained of all Endurance and unable
Elude.display_target_help: You can improve your reflexes, making yourself so quick you can Elude almost any attack, be it ranged, melee, or area effect. Your running speed and jumping height are also increased. When Elude wears off, you are left drained of all Endurance and unable

Shadow_Punch.display_help: You wrap your fists with Negative Energy channeled from the Netherworlds, then perform a quick punch that deals minor damage. Shadow Punches cloud the target's vision, lowering his Accuracy for a short time. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast
Shadow_Punch.display_target_help: The Shadow Punch has reduced your Accuracy.

Smite.display_help: You wrap your fists with Negative Energy channeled from the Netherworlds, then perform a Smite that deals more damage than Shadow Punch, but has a longer recharge time. Smite clouds the target's vision, lowering his Accuracy for a short time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Smite.display_target_help: The Smite has reduced your Accuracy.

Shadow_Maul.display_help: You wrap your entire arms with Negative Energy channeled from the Netherworlds, then perform a series of blows that deal a lot of damage over a short period of time to multiple targets in front of you. These blows cloud your target's vision, lowering his Accuracy for a short time. Damage: High(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
Shadow_Maul.display_target_help: Your Accuracy has been reduced by the Shadow Maul.

Gloom.display_help: Gloom slowly drains a target of life, while reducing his Accuracy. Slower than Dark Blast, but deals more damage over time. Damage: High(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
Gloom.display_target_help: The Gloom is causing damage to you and reducing your Accuracy.

Dark_Embrace.display_help: You tap into the energy of the Netherworld to protect yourself from damage.

Dark_Regeneration.display_help: You can tap the dark essence of the Netherworld to drain a small amount of life from all enemies nearby, thus healing yourself. The more foes affected, the more you will be healed. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

Siphon_Life.display_help: You tap the power of the Netherworld and create a life transferring conduit between a foe and yourself. This will transfer Hit Points from your enemy to yourself. Foes Siphoned in this manner have their Accuracy reduced. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Siphon_Life.display_target_help: Your Accuracy has been reduced by the Siphon Life attack.

Dark_Consumption.display_help: The dark power of the Netherworld allows you to tap the essence of your foe's soul and transfer it to yourself. This will drain the Hit Points of your enemy and add to your Endurance. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Very Long

Touch_of_Fear.display_help: The Netherworld is one scary place, and with but a touch, you can give your enemy a glimpse into this dark world. This will cause them to helplessly tremble in Fear. Foes in this state of panic have reduced Accuracy. Recharge: Moderate
Touch_of_Fear.display_target_help: You are terrified and your Accuracy is reduced.

Obsidian_Shield.display_help: You tap into the energy of the Netherworld to protect yourself from damage.

Soul_Drain.display_help: Using this power, you can drain the essence of all nearby foes' souls, thus increasing your own strength. Each affected foe will lose some Hit Points and add to your Damage and Accuracy. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Very Long

Midnight_Grasp.display_help: Mastery over the forces of the Netherworld allows you to create dark tentacles that can Immobilize a foe and continuously drain his life force. Damage: Superior(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Midnight_Grasp.display_target_help: The dark tentacles of the Midnight Grasp are holding you immobile. Your Accuracy is reduced.

Gloom.display_help: Gloom slowly drains a target of life, while reducing his Accuracy. Slower than Dark Blast, but deals more damage over time. Damage: High(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
Gloom.display_target_help: The Gloom is causing damage to you and reducing your Accuracy.

Tenebrous_Tentacles.display_help: You can create a cone shaped rift to the Netherworld that allows its native creatures to slip their oily Tentacles into our reality. These creatures will snare all foes within range, Immobilizing them while the Tentacles drain their life and reduce their Accuracy. Recharge: Slow
Tenebrous_Tentacles.display_target_help: The Tenebrous Tentacles are holding you immobile and reducing your Accuracy.

Twilight_Grasp.display_help: You channel Negative Energy from the Netherworld through yourself to a targeted foe. Twilight Grasp drains the power from that target and slowly transfers it to you and all nearby allies. The targeted foe's Accuracy and damage are reduced, while you and your nearby allies are healed. Recharge: Moderate
Twilight_Grasp.display_target_help: The Twilight Grasp has reduced your Accuracy and Damage potential.

Night_Fall.display_help: Unleashes a cone shaped burst of particles from the Netherworld. All targets within the modest range of this power take Negative Energy damage and have a reduced Accuracy. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Night_Fall.display_target_help: Night Fall has reduced your Accuracy.

Fearsome_Stare.display_help: Instills tremendous Fear within a cone area in front of you, causing all affected targets to tremble in Terror uncontrollably. Recharge: Slow
Fearsome_Stare.display_target_help: The Fearsome Stare has terrified you and reduced your Accuracy.

Torrent.display_help: You summon a wave of mire that sweeps away foes within its arc. The attack deals minimal Negative Energy damage, but sends foes flying and reduces their Accuracy. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow
Torrent.display_target_help: The Torrent has reduced your Accuracy.

Blackstar.display_help: You can unleash a devastating blast of Negative Energy around yourself, dealing massive damage and severely reducing affected foes' Accuracy. This power leaves you drained of Endurance and unable to recover Endurance for a while. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Long
Blackstar.display_target_help: Your Accuracy has been reduced by the Blackstar.

Petrifying_Gaze.display_help: Petrifies a single targeted foe with a terrifying gaze. The victim is Held and defenseless. Recharge: Slow
Petrifying_Gaze.display_target_help: The Petrifying Gaze has stopped you in your tracks!
Petrifying_Gaze.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} attempts to Hold you with a Petrifying Gaze.

Life_Drain.display_help: You can tap the power of the Netherworld to steal some life from a target foe and reduce his Accuracy. Some of that stolen life is transferred to you in the form of Hit Points. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Life_Drain.display_target_help: Your Accuracy has been reduced by the Life Drain.

Dark_Servant.display_help: Summons a Dark Servant to your aid. The Dark Servant possesses an assortment of dark powers to weaken your foes. The summoned entity is not a willing servant, and it is only your power that binds it in this realm. The Dark Servant can be buffed and healed. Recharge: Very Long
Dark_Servant.display_short_help: Summon Dark Servant: Ranged Debuff Special

Charged_Brawl.display_help: Your fists become electrically charged and deliver a powerful punch. Charged Brawl can drain some Endurance from the target and may overload his synapses, leaving him writhing for a moment. A portion of drained Endurance may be returned to you. Disturbing an overloaded target will disperse the electrical charge and release him. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast
Charged_Brawl.display_target_help: You are in shock from the Charged Brawl attack and cannot move.

Havoc_Punch.display_help: The Havoc Punch is a slower attack than Charged Brawl, but makes up for it with a greater damage. Havoc Punch can drain some Endurance from your target and may overload his synapses, leaving him writhing for a moment. A portion of the drained Endurance may be given back to you. Disturbing an overloaded target will disperse the electrical charge and release him. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Havoc_Punch.display_target_help: You are in shock from the Havok Punch attack and cannot move.

Jacobs_Ladder.display_help: You are able to generate a strong current between your arms and snap a powerful bolt of electricity in an arc in front of you. This melee attack can electrocute all foes within the arc dealing High energy damage. Jacobs Ladder can drain some Endurance from your target and may overload his synapses, leaving him writhing for a moment. Disturbing an overloaded target will disperse the electrical charge and release him. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
Jacobs_Ladder.display_target_help: You are in shock from the Jacobs Ladder attack and cannot move.

Charged_Armor.display_help: When you toggle on this power, you are surrounded in a charged field that makes you highly resistant to Smashing, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy and Negative Energy damage.
Charged_Armor.display_short_help: Toggle: Self +Res(Smash, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative Energy)

Thunderous_Blast.display_help: The Hero's Thunderous Blast has temporarily halted your Endurance Recovery.
Thunderous_Blast.display_target_help: The Hero's Thunderous Blast has temporarily halted your Endurance Recovery.

Thunder_Strike.display_help: A massive attack. You smash your foes with all the power of a lightning bolt. The pummeled victim takes tremendous damage and may be Disoriented. Any nearby foes may be knocked down and take some damage from the shockwave. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
Thunder_Strike.display_short_help: Melee (AoE), High DMG(Smash, Energy), Foe Disorient, Knockback

Power_Sink.display_help: Power Sink leeches energy directly from the bodies of all nearby foes, draining their Endurance. Each foe you draw energy from increases your Endurance. If there are no foes within range, you will not gain any Endurance. Recharge: Long

Static_Shield.display_help: When you toggle on this power, you are surrounded in a charged field that makes you highly resistant to Smashing, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy and Negative Energy damage. This Static Shield protects you from Hold, Sleep, and Disorient effects as well as Endurance Drain, Recovery DeBuffs and enemy Teleportation. Static Shield can also help normalize your synaptic activity, granting you good resistance to Psionic Damage. Recharge: Fast
Static_Shield.display_short_help: Toggle: Self +Res(Smash, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative Energy), +Res(Hold, Sleep, Disorient, End Drain, Recovery DeBuff, Psionic, Teleport)

Ball_Lightning.display_help: The Ball Lightning is continuing to electrocute you.

Chain_Induction.display_help: This Electric Melee attack deals moderate Smashing and Energy damage and may drain some of the targets Endurance. However, this attack also induces an unstable electric charge that may jump to another enemy target. The charge will jump randomly between multiple targets, until it inevitably dissipates. Enhancements and Fury will only boost the effectiveness of the initial attacks, not the jumping charge. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Chain_Induction.display_target_help: You still carry a charge leftover from the Chain Induction punch. You may accidentally release this charge and zap a nearby ally.

Lightning_Clap.display_help: You can clap your hands together to release a violent Lightning Clap. The Lightning Clap can knock down most nearby foes, Disorienting many of them. Lightning Clap deals no damage. Recharge: Slow

Power_Surge.display_help: When you activate this power, you transform your body into living Electricity and become extremely resistant to all damage but Psionics, as well as Disorient, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, Knockback, End Drain, Recovery DeBuff, and enemy Teleportation. Your Endurance recovery is also increased. As Power Surge wears off, the charge in your body explodes in a massive EMP pulse. However, expending all this energy will leave you exhausted, and drained of almost all Health and Endurance. Recharge: Very Long

Energy_Drain.display_help: Energy Drain leeches energy directly from the bodies of all nearby foes, draining their Endurance. Each foe you draw energy from increases your Endurance and Hit Points. If there are no foes within range, you will not gain any Endurance. Recharge: Long

Total_Focus.display_help: Total Focus is complete mastery over Energy Melee. This is a very slow, but incredibly devastating attack that can knock out most opponents, leaving them Disoriented. Due to the exhausting nature of Total Focus, recharge time is very long. Damage: Extreme

Overload.display_help: You can Overload your Energy Aura and dramatically improve your defense to all attack types except Psionic Attacks. Overload also grants you high resistance to Defense Debuffs. This Energy Aura is so powerful, that it can even absorb some damage, effectively increasing your Max Hit Points, However, when Overload wears off, you are left drained of all Endurance and unable to Recover Endurance for a while. Recharge: Very Long
Overload.display_short_help: Self +DEF(All but Psionics), +Recovery, +Max HP, Res(DeBuff DEF), +Special

Barrage.display_help: A Barrage from the Hero has Disoriented you.
Barrage.display_target_help: A Barrage from the Hero has Disoriented you.

Energy_Punch.display_help: An Energy Punch from the Hero has Disoriented you.
Energy_Punch.display_target_help: An Energy Punch from the Hero has Disoriented you.

Power_Blast.display_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock him back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Kinetic_Shield.display_help: Your Defense to Smashing, Lethal, Cold, Fire, Energy, and Negative Energy attacks is increased. The shield also grants you good resistance to Defense Debuffs.
Kinetic_Shield.display_short_help: Toggle: Self +DEF(Smashing, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative), Res(DeBuff DEF)

Laser_Beam_Eyes.display_help: You can emit Laser Beams from your eyes, dealing moderate Energy damage. This attack can reduce the target's Defense. You must have Conserve Power or Focused Accuracy before selecting this power. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

Whirling_Hands.display_help: A Whirling Hands attack has Disoriented you.

Entropy_Shield.display_help: Your Defense to Smashing, Lethal, Cold, Fire, Energy, and Negative Energy attacks is increased. The shield also makes you resistant to Knockback, Repel, Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilization, Defense Debuffs and enemy Teleportation for as long as you can keep this toggle power active.
Entropy_Shield.display_short_help: Toggle: Self +DEF(Smashing, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative), +Res(Knockback, Repel, Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize, Teleport, DeBuff DEF

Energy_Torrent.display_help: Unleashes a cone of energy that knocks foes back.
Energy_Torrent.display_target_help: Unleashes a cone of energy that knocks foes back.

Power_Burst.display_help: A short range, but devastating attack. Damage: Heavy, Recharge: Slow
Power_Burst.display_target_help: A short range, but devastating attack. Damage: Heavy, Recharge: Slow

Power_Bolt.display_help: A quick attack that rapidly hurls small bolts of energy at foes, sometimes knocking them down. Fast, but little damage.
Power_Bolt.display_target_help: A quick attack that rapidly hurls small bolts of energy at foes, sometimes knocking them down. Fast, but little damage.

Power_Blast.display_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock him back.
Power_Blast.display_target_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock him back.

Explosive_Blast.display_help: Hurls a blast of charged energy that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target.
Explosive_Blast.display_target_help: Hurls a blast of charged energy that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target.

Power_Push.display_help: This ranged attack deals little damage, but sends the target flying for a great distance. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate
Power_Push.display_short_help: Ranged Minor DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe High Knockback

Scorch.display_help: The Hero's hands are engulfed in flames, igniting the target.

Cremate.display_help: A slow but devastating attack. Cremate clobbers your foes with a massive 2 handed fiery smash that leaves your foe set on fire. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Fire_Sword.display_help: The Hero can summon a fire sword that sets foes ablaze. Successful attacks will also do a slight damage over time.

Fire_Breath.display_help: The Hero breaths forth a cone of fire that burns all foes within it's narrow cone. Very accurate and very deadly at medium range.

Fire_Shield.display_help: While this power is active, you get a good resistance to Lethal, Smashing and Fire damage. Fire Shield also provides minimal resistance to Cold damage. Recharge: Very Fast

Greater_Fire_Sword.display_help: Your mastery of fire allows you to create an enhanced Sword of Fire that can set foes ablaze. Successful attacks from the Greater Fire Sword will ignite your target, dealing damage over time. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

Fiery_Embrace.display_help: Significantly boosts the damage of all your Fire attacks for quite a while. Also increases the damage of all your other non-fire based attacks for a short while. Recharge: Very Long

Consume.display_help: You can drain body heat from all nearby foes in order to replenish your own Endurance. The more foes affected, the more Endurance is gained. Foes suffer minimal Fire damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Long

Incinerate.display_help: Intense concentration can allow you to Incinerate an opponent. This will set your foe ablaze, dealing damage over time. Damage: High(DoT), Recharge: Slow

Plasma_Shield.display_help: While this power is active, you get a good resistance to Lethal, Smashing, Fire Cold, Energy and Negative Energy damage. Plasma Shield also gives your protection from Sleep and Hold effects.
Plasma_Shield.display_short_help: Toggle: Self +Res(Smash, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative, Hold, Sleep))

Fire_Sword_Circle.display_help: Mastery of your Fire Sword has enabled you to make an attack on every foe within melee distance. This will slash and burn your enemies, dealing minor damage and setting them ablaze. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

Healing_Flames.display_help: You can concentrate for a few moments and to dramatically heal himself with Healing Flames. The power of the flames can also protect you from Disorientation for a while.

Flares.display_help: You have been set on fire by the Flares attack.
Flares.display_target_help: You have been set on fire by the Flares attack.

Fire_Blast.display_help: You have been set on fire by the Fire Blast.
Fire_Blast.display_target_help: You have been set on fire by the Fire Blast.

Fire_Ball.display_help: You have been set on fire by the Fireball.
Fire_Ball.display_target_help: You have been set on fire by the Fireball.

Fire_Breath.display_help: The Legacy of Flame breaths forth a cone of fire that burns all foes within it's narrow cone. Very accurate and very deadly at medium range.
Fire_Breath.display_target_help: The Legacy of Flame breaths forth a cone of fire that burns all foes within it's narrow cone. Very accurate and very deadly at medium range.

Rain_of_Fire.display_help: Summons a Rain of Fire over a targeted location, burning foes within a large area. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Long
Rain_of_Fire.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Blaze.display_help: A short range, but devastating flame attack. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
Blaze.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Warmth.display_help: You can use your Warmth to heal some of your wounds, and the wounds of your group. This power has a small radius, so your allies need to be near you if they wish to be affected. Recharge: Moderate

Cauterize.display_help: Heals a single targeted ally by cauterizing their wounds. You cannot use this power to heal yourself. Recharge: Fast

Melt_Armor.display_help: The searing Heat from this power is enough to Melt the Armor and defenses of all targets in the affected area. Melt Armor significantly weakens the Defense and Damage Resistance of the affected targets. Recharge: Long
Melt_Armor.display_target_help: Your Defense and Damage Resistances have been reduced.
Melt_Armor.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} reduced the Defense and Damage Resistance of {PlayerDest}.
Melt_Armor.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} melts your armor lowering your defenses and damage potential.

Inferno.display_help: Unleashes a massive fiery explosion to devastate all nearby enemies and set them ablaze. Inferno deals massive damage to all nearby foes, although the damage does vary. Activating this power leaves you drained of Endurance and unable to recover Endurance for a while. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Long
Inferno.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Char.display_help: Incapacitates a distant foe by Charring him with smoldering soot and cinders. The target is left helpless, choking on the soot. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
Char.display_target_help: The Soot is causing damage to you and preventing you from acting.

Fire_Cages.display_help: Immobilizes a group of foes in Fire Cages, dealing Fire damage over time. More resilient foes may require multiple Fire Cages to Immobilize. Fire Cages is slower and less damaging than Ring of Fire, but can capture multiple targets. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
Fire_Cages.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Minor DoT(Fire), Foe Immobilize
Fire_Cages.display_target_help: The Fire Cage is burning you and preventing you from moving.

Flashfire.display_help: You can bring forth a Flashfire to Disorient a group of foes and deal some damage over time. Target must be on the ground to activate Flashfire. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Flashfire.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Minor DoT(Fire), Foe Disorient

Cinders.display_help: Incapacitates foes around the caster by whirling Cinders around them. The targets are left helpless, choking on the soot. Recharge: Very Long

Incinerate.display_help: Intense concentration can allow you to Incinerate an opponent at melee range. This will set your foe ablaze, dealing damage over time. Damage: High(DoT), Recharge: Slow

Fire_Breath.display_help: You can breathe forth a torrent of fire that burns all foes within its narrow cone. Very accurate and very deadly at medium range. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Fire_Breath.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Fire_Blast.display_help: Sends a Blast of Fire at a targeted foe and sets the target on fire for a short period of time. Slower recharge rate than Flares, but more damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Fire_Blast.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Combustion.display_help: Your mastery of fire allows you to violently raise the temperature around yourself in an attempt to spontaneously combust any nearby foes and set them ablaze, dealing damage over time. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow

Fire_Imps.display_help: You can craft 3 small Fire Imps out of pure flame in a targeted location. Fire Imps will viciously attack any nearby foes, but they only possess the most basic instincts. Fire Imps can be healed and buffed like any teammate. Recharge: Very Long

Blaze.display_help: A short range, but devastating flame attack. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
Blaze.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Crush.display_help: You are being Crushed. You are Immobilized, taking Smashing Damage over Time, and cannot Fly.
Crush.display_target_help: You are being Crushed. You are Immobilized, taking Smashing Damage over Time, and cannot Fly.

Lift.display_help: Negates the gravity around a single target. Lift violently sends an enemy straight into the air, then slams him to the ground for Smashing damage. This power can bring flying foes to the ground. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Propel.display_help: The Hero can open up a portal and pull in a heavy object that her can then levitate and propel at foes!
Propel.display_target_help: The Hero can open up a portal and pull in a heavy object that her can then levitate and propel at foes!

Power_Blast.display_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock him back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Total_Focus.display_help: Total Focus is complete mastery over Energy Melee. This melee attack is a very slow, but incredibly devastating attack that can knock out most opponents, leaving them Disoriented. Due to the exhausting nature of Total Focus, recharge time is very long. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Long

Crushing_Field.display_help: Creates a large gravitational field strong enough to Immobilize multiple foes. Crushing Field can also bring down flying entities. Slower and less damaging than Crush, but can capture multiple targets. Crushing Field deals Smashing damage over time and ca
Crushing_Field.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Minor DoT(Smash), Foe Immobilize, -Fly
Crushing_Field.display_target_help: You are being Crushed. You cannot move or fly.

Power_Burst.display_help: A short range, but devastating attack. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow

Singularity.display_help: You can create a very powerful Gravitational Singularity. The Singularity will engage your foes, assaulting them with various gravity powers. Any foes that attempt to approach the Singularity will be violently hurled away.

Gravity_Distortion.display_help: Causes a single foe to be trapped in a misshapen gravity field, rendering him unable to take action. Gravity Distortion deals Smashing damage to the target. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
Gravity_Distortion.display_target_help: You have been caught in a Gravity Distortion. You cannot move and cannot fly.

Ice_Bolt.display_help: Your Attack and Movement rate has been slowed.
Ice_Bolt.display_target_help: Your Attack and Movement rate has been slowed.

Ice_Blast.display_help: You have been frozen by an Ice Blast. Your movement Speed and Recharge rate are reduced.
Ice_Blast.display_target_help: You have been frozen by an Ice Blast. Your movement Speed and Recharge rate are reduced.

Frost_Breath.display_help: You are frozen by the Frost Breath. You are taking damage over time and your attack speed and movement speed are reduced.
Frost_Breath.display_target_help: You are frozen by the Frost Breath. You are taking damage over time and your attack speed and movement speed are reduced.

Freeze_Ray.display_help: Although this power deals very little damage, the Freeze Ray encases your foe in a block of ice, holding him helpless in place for a while. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate
Freeze_Ray.display_target_help: You are frozen solid by the Freeze Ray.

Ice_Storm.display_help: The Ice Storm is freezing you. You are taking Cold damage over time and your attack and movement speeds are reduced.
Ice_Storm.display_target_help: The Ice Storm is freezing you. You are taking Cold damage over time and your attack and movement speeds are reduced.

Bitter_Ice_Blast.display_help: A slower yet more powerful version of Ice Blast, Bitter Ice Blast deals much more damage and can also reduce your enemy's Accuracy. Like other Ice Blast powers, Bitter Ice Blast can Slow a target's movement and attack speed.
Bitter_Ice_Blast.display_target_help: Your Accuracy, Attack rate and Running speed are reduced by the Bitter Ice Blast.

Frostwork.display_help: Covers an ally in a thick layer of Frost. The frost can absorb the impact from enemy attacks, effectively increasing your ally's maximum Hit Points for a short time. Frostwork also grants your ally resistance to Toxic Damage. Recharge: Very Long
Frostwork.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} increases the maximum Hit Points or {PlayerDest} and grants him some resistance to Toxic damage.
Frostwork.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} has increases your maximum Hit Points and grants you some resistance to Toxic damage.

Bitter_Freeze_Ray.display_help: This power can Hold your opponent frozen solid in a block of ice. The victim can be attacked and will remain frozen and helpless. After the ice thaws, the victim emerges chilled and Slowed. Bitter Freeze Ray deals medium damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Bitter_Freeze_Ray.display_target_help: You are frozen solid by the Bitter Freeze Ray.

Heat_Loss.display_help: Heat Loss drains the heat from your enemies and transfers that energy to your allies in the form of Endurance. All foes near the selected target may experience a Heat Loss, which will drain their Endurance, Slow them, and reduce their Damage Resistance. Each enemy target that is successfully drained of Heat will expel that energy to all your nearby allies, granting them Endurance and a boost to their Endurance Recovery. Some Endurance and Recovery will also be transferred directly to you and any allies near you. Recharge: Long

Blizzard.display_help: The massive damage from the Blizzard can Slow the attack rate of all your opponents in a large area, reducing their Accuracy and possibly knocking them back. Activating this power leaves you drained of Endurance and unable to recover any Endurance for a while. Damage: Extreme(DoT), Recharge: Very Long
Blizzard.display_short_help: Ranged (Location AoE), Extreme DoT(Cold), Foe -ACC, -SPD, -Recharge, Knockback, Self -Recovery
Blizzard.display_target_help: You are caught in a freezing Blizzard. You are freezing and your Attack rate, Accuracy and Movement speed are reduced.

Storm_Kick.display_help: Unleashes a flurry of quick kicks to pummel your foe.
Storm_Kick.display_target_help: Unleashes a flurry of quick kicks to pummel your foe.

Shurikens.display_help: Three thrown dagger that can hit multiple targets.
Shurikens.display_target_help: Three thrown dagger that can hit multiple targets.

Focused_Fighting.display_help: You become more evasive to melee and ranged attacks. Your Focus also offers you resistance to Confuse effects and allows you to perceive stealthy foes.
Focused_Fighting.display_target_help: You become more evasive to melee and ranged attacks. Your Focus also offers you resistance to Confuse effects and allows you to perceive stealthy foes.

Inner_Focus.display_help: You become more evasive to melee, ranged attacks, area effect attacks and cone shaped attacks. Your Focus also offers you resistance to Confuse effects and allows you to perceive stealthy foes.
Inner_Focus.display_target_help: You become more evasive to melee, ranged attacks, area effect attacks and cone shaped attacks. Your Focus also offers you resistance to Confuse effects and allows you to perceive stealthy foes.

Crane_Kick.display_help: A slow, high damage kick that can send your target flying!
Crane_Kick.display_target_help: A slow, high damage kick that can send your target flying!

Exploding_Shuriken.display_help: This small throwing star is rigged to explode on impact. You must have two other Weapon Mastery Powers before selecting this power. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Dragons_Tail.display_help: This low spinning kick deals the same damage as Thunder Kick, but has a chance to hit all enemies in melee range. Successful hits will trip and knock down your opponents. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Dragons_Tail.display_short_help: PBAoE Melee, Moderate DMG(Smash), Foe Knockback

Quickness.display_help: Your Quick reflexes allow you to move faster than normal, as well as resist slow effects. This power is always on and permanently increases your attack rate and movement speed.

Elude.display_help: You can improve your reflexes, making yourself so quick you can Elude almost any attack, be it ranged, melee, or area effect. Your running speed and jumping height are also increased. When Elude wears off, you are left drained of all Endurance and unable
Elude.display_target_help: You can improve your reflexes, making yourself so quick you can Elude almost any attack, be it ranged, melee, or area effect. Your running speed and jumping height are also increased. When Elude wears off, you are left drained of all Endurance and unable

Maneuvers.display_help: Good leaders are rare. These powers can grant bonuses to your and your teammates.
Maneuvers.display_short_help: PBAoE, Team +DEF(All), +DMG, Res(Taunt, Placate), +ACC, Res(Confuse, Fear), +Perception

Mind_Probe.display_help: Grip the minds of your foe with a Mind Probe. You must be in close proximity to pull off this attack that wrecks havoc on your foes synapses, dealing moderate Psionic Damage while reducing his attack speed. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Mind_Probe.display_target_help: The Mind Probe has slowed your Attack rate.

Psychic_Scream.display_help: This howl of Psionic energy resonates in the minds of all foes within its conical area of effect, inflicting moderate damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Psychic_Scream.display_target_help: The Psychic Scream has reduced your Attack rate.

Drain_Psyche.display_help: You Drain the Psyche of you nearby foes, thus weakening their Hit Point Regeneration and Endurance Recovery and boosting your own. Recharge: Very Long

Subdue.display_help: Subdue deals moderate Psionic damage and may leave the targeted foe Immobilized for a brief time. Immobilized foes cannot move but can still attack. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Subdue.display_target_help: You have been Subdued and are being held immobile.

Levitate.display_help: You can send a single target violently into the air, then slam him to the ground for Smashing damage. This power can bring flying foes to the ground. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Levitate.display_target_help: You can send a single target violently into the air, then slam him to the ground for Smashing damage. This power can bring flying foes to the ground. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Dominate.display_help: Psychic energy tears at your mind rendering you helpless, lost in your own mind and unable to defend yourself.
Dominate.display_target_help: Psychic energy tears at your mind rendering you helpless, lost in your own mind and unable to defend yourself.

Terrify.display_help: This power Terrifies foes within a cone area in front of you, causing them to tremble in Fear uncontrollably. The affect is so frightening and overwhelming, that the target takes real damage from the physiological response to this Psionic attack. Damage:

Mass_Hypnosis.display_help: You have been hypnotized. You are helpless for a while, unless something snaps you out of it.
Mass_Hypnosis.display_target_help: You have been hypnotized. You are helpless for a while, unless something snaps you out of it.

Total_Domination.display_help: This powerful attack deals Psionic damage, and is so painful it usually renders its target unconscious. The victim is asleep, and will wake if disturbed. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

Psychic_Shockwave.display_help: Psychic Shockwave is a devastating Psionic attack that wracks the minds of all nearby foes. Affected foes may have a reduced attack rate and may be left Disoriented. Damage: High Recharge: Slow
Psychic_Shockwave.display_target_help: The Psychic Wail has reduced your attack rate.

Dark_Blast.display_help: A long range blast of dark energy. Deals moderate Negative Energy damage and reduces the target's Accuracy. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Dark_Blast.display_target_help: The Dark Blast has reduced your Accuracy.

Gloom.display_help: Gloom slowly drains a target of life, while reducing his Accuracy. Slower than Dark Blast, but deals more damage over time. Damage: High(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
Gloom.display_target_help: The Gloom is causing damage to you and reducing your Accuracy.

Life_Drain.display_help: You can tap the power of the Netherworld to steal some life from a target foe and reduce his Accuracy. Some of that stolen life is transferred to you in the form of Hit Points. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Life_Drain.display_target_help: Your Accuracy has been reduced by the Life Drain.

Zombie_Horde.display_help: Summons one to three Zombies (depending on your level) to do your bidding. Zombies are very tough but can be slow and stupid. They start out with only rudimentary melee attacks, but can be empowered with range and even life draining powers. You may only have 3 Zombies under your control at any given time. If you attempt to summon more Zombies, you can only replace the ones you have lost in battle. If you already have three, the power will fail. Recharge: Very Long

Grave_Knight.display_help: You can summon one to two powerful Grave Knights (depending on your level) to do your bidding. Grave Knights come well equipped with several attack powers and can be empowered with even more. You may only have 2 Grave Knights under your control at any given time. If you attempt to summon more Grave Knights, you can only replace the ones you have lost in battle. If you already have two, the power will fail. Recharge: Very Long

Lich.display_help: Summons a dark and powerful Lich. The lich is an undead entity that, when alive, possessed many dark powers of his own. Perhaps it was a dark wizard, or powerful arch villain. Perhaps it was even a Necromancer. Now it only hungers for the souls of the living, and is quite good at feeding itself. The Lich specializes in dark control and draining powers. You may only have 1 Lich under your control at any given time. If you attempt to summon another Lich, the power will fail. Recharge: Very Long

Alkaloid.display_help: When used correctly, poisons can be used to heal, as well as harm. Alkaloid consists of just the right amount of amino acids to safely heal a single targeted ally. The healed target is also left with some resistance to Toxic Damage (This Toxic Damage Resistance cannot be Enhanced). You cannot use this power to heal yourself. Recharge: Fast

Neurotoxic_Breath.display_help: You can breath a cone of Neurotoxin gas that quickly start to anesthetize any nearby foes. Affected targets may choke on the gas as their movement and attack rate are severely reduced. Recharge: Slow
Neurotoxic_Breath.display_target_help: You are choking on Neurotoxic gas. Your attack rate and movement speed are reduced.
Neurotoxic_Breath.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} dramatically Slows the attack speed and movement of {PlayerDest}

Paralytic_Poison.display_help: This Paralytic Poison viciously attacks a foe's nervous system and can leave an affected target completely Held and defenseless. Recharge: Slow
Paralytic_Poison.display_target_help: The Paralytic Poison has left you completely Held and defenseless!
Paralytic_Poison.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} attempts to Hold you with a Paralytic Poison.

Snap_Shot.display_help: A quick attack that fires an arrow at your foe after only minimal aiming. Fast, but little damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

Aimed_Shot.display_help: Though it takes longer to execute, your Aimed Shot deals greater damage than Snap Shot. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Fistful_of_Arrows.display_help: You fire a fistful of arrows at foes in a cone in front of you. Good at close range. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Call_Genin.display_help: Calls forth one to three Genin Ninja (depending on your level) to do your bidding. Genin have good reflexes and jumping skill, but they are still the lowest rank Ninja and only possess the most rudimentary skills, However, they can be trained in more advanced techniques and weapons. You may only have 3 Genin under your control at any given time. If you attempt to call Genin, you can only replace the ones you have lost in battle. If you already have three, the power will fail. Recharge: Very Long

Call_Jounin.display_help: You can summon one to two highly skilled Jounin Ninja (depending on your level). Jounin Ninja are master assassins and expert swordsmen. They possess superior reflexes and jumping skill. Like all Henchmen, Jounin can be trained in even deadlier Ninjitsu techniques and weapons. You may only have 2 Jounin under your control at any given time. If you attempt to summon more Jounin, you can only replace the ones you have lost in battle. If you already have two, the power will fail. Recharge: Very Long

Oni.display_help: Summons an ancient and powerful Oni. An Oni is a powerful human-like demon warrior. The Oni is a formidable creature who possesses the skill of a warrior and the powers of wind and fire. You may only have 1 Oni under your control at any given time. If you attempt to summon another Oni, the power will fail. Recharge: Very Long

Ice_Arrow.display_help: This arrow can freeze a single foe in a block of ice. The target is frozen solid, helpless, and can be attacked. More powerful foes may not be Held, but all affected targets will be Slowed. Recharge: Moderate
Ice_Arrow.display_target_help: You are frozen in a Block of Ice. Once free, your Attack Rate and Running speed will be reduced slightly for a while.

Acid_Arrow.display_help: This arrow explodes in a small shower of acid on impact. This acid eats through armor, causing damage over time. It reduces the target's Defense as well as his Damage Resistance. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow
Acid_Arrow.display_target_help: Your Resistances and Defense have been weakened by the Acid Arrow.
Acid_Arrow.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with an Acid Arrow. The acid is burning you and reducing your damage resistance.

EMP_Arrow.display_help: This arrow can unleash a massive pulse of electromagnetic energy on impact. This EMP can affect machines, and is even powerful enough to affect synaptic brain patterns. It will incapacitate all foes in its radius. Additionally, most machines and robots will take moderate high damage. However, this power uses a lot of Endurance and leaves you unable to recover Endurance for a while. Recharge: Very Long
EMP_Arrow.display_short_help: PBAoE, Foe Hold, Special vs. Robots, Self -Recovery
EMP_Arrow.display_target_help: You are held immobile by the EMP Pulse, and your Regeneration Rate is reduced.

Strangler.display_help: Holds a distant foe by Strangling him with massive root-like vines. The target is held helpless, while he is slowly crushed by the vines. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
Strangler.display_target_help: The Strangler Vine is crushing you and preventing you from acting.

Roots.display_help: Immobilizes a group of foes by entangling their feet in a twisted mass of thorny Roots. Roots is slower and does less damage than Entangle, but it can capture multiple foes in one attack. Like Entangle, Roots can immobilize flying targets, if they are near the ground when attacked. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Fast
Roots.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Minor DoT(Smashing, Lethal), Foe Immobilize
Roots.display_target_help: The Roots have entangled you. You are immobile and cannot fly.

Seeds_of_Confusion.display_help: You throw a handful of seeds from a rare Baffle plant at your foes. The seeds spread out in a wide cone and release a dusty chaff that contain a number of alkaloids and hallucinogenic compounds. Foes that come into contact with these seeds become violently confused and will turn and attack each other, ignoring you and all your allies. You will not receive any Experience Points for foes defeated entirely by Confused enemies. Recharge: Very Long
Seeds_of_Confusion.display_target_help: You are confused and may attack an incorrect target.

Vines.display_help: Creates a field of Strangler Vines that can Hold multiple foes at range. The affected targets are held helpless by the massive root-like vines. Unlike the power Strangler, this power does not deal any damage, but it can Hold multiple foes at once. Recharge: Very Long
Vines.display_target_help: The Vines are Holding you and preventing you from acting.

Skewer.display_help: You lunge forward with this melee attack and Skewer your foe with the large Thorn on your arm. Deals moderate damage and poisons your foe. Poison from the Thorns deals additional Toxic damage and can reduce your foes Defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Skewer.display_target_help: You are poisoned! You are taking Toxic Damage and your Defense is Reduced.

Fling_Thorns.display_help: You can throw dozens of Thorns in a wide cone in front of you, impaling foes caught within the area. These Thorns deals moderate damage, and poisons any targets it hits. Thorn poison deals additional Toxic damage and can reduce your foes' Defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Fling_Thorns.display_target_help: You are poisoned! You are taking Toxic Damage and your Defense is Reduced.

Thorn_Burst.display_help: You can explode dozens of Thorns in all directions around you. These Thorns only travel a short distance, but they can deal moderate damage and poison any target close to you. Toxic damage from the thorns can reduce the Defense of affected foes. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Thorn_Burst.display_target_help: You are poisoned! You are taking Toxic Damage and your Defense is Reduced.

Ripper.display_help: You can unleash a spectacular slashing maneuver that attacks all foes in a wide arc directly in front of you. Ripper deals massive damage and poisons multiple targets. It can even knock foes down. Thorn poison deals additional Toxic damage and can reduce your foes Defense. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
Ripper.display_target_help: You are poisoned! You are taking Toxic Damage and your Defense is Reduced.

Fly_Trap.display_help: You can summon a giant carnivorous Fly Trap plant beast. Fly Trap may be an understatement, as this plant beast has a taste for flesh. The Fly Trap will viciously attack any nearby foes; biting, hurling poisonous Thorns and even casting its own Entangle Roots. The Fly Trap will fight by your side and can be healed and buffed like any teammate. Recharge: Very Long
Fly_Trap.display_short_help: Summon Fly Trap: Ranged Control Special

Thorn_Barrage.display_help: A short range, but devastating attack. Thorn Barrage unleashes your Thorns at high velocity causing severe damage at close range. Although these Thorns only travel a short distance, their impact can knock most foes on their back. Thorn poison deals additional Toxic damage and can reduce your foes Defense. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
Thorn_Barrage.display_target_help: You are poisoned! You are taking Toxic Damage and your Defense is Reduced.

Atomic_Blast.display_help: Your Defense has been reduced and left you helpless by an Atomic Blast.
Atomic_Blast.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced and left you helpless by an Atomic Blast.

Neutrino_Bolt.display_help: A very quick, but low damage attack. Neutrino Blast can reduce the target's Defense. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast
Neutrino_Bolt.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the Neutrino Bolt.

X-Ray_Beam.display_help: You can emit a beam of X-Ray energy from your eyes, dealing moderate Energy damage. This attack can bypass some defenses and can reduce the target's Defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
X-Ray_Beam.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the X-Ray Beam.

Enervating_Field.display_help: You have been exposed to an Enervating Field of radiation. Your damage and damage resistance are reduced.
Enervating_Field.display_target_help: You have been exposed to an Enervating Field of radiation. Your damage and damage resistance are reduced.

Electron_Haze.display_help: A short range conical blast of free electrons. This attack can bypass some of a target's defenses and reduce the target's Defense. It can also knock some targets down. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Electron_Haze.display_target_help: The Electron Haze has reduced your Defenses.

Lingering_Radiation.display_help: You can emit Lingering Radiation that reduces the attack rate, movement speed, and Regeneration rate of the target, and all nearby foes. Recharge: Slow
Lingering_Radiation.display_target_help: Your Attack rate, Running speed, and Regeneration rate have been reduced by the Lingering Radiation.

Cosmic_Burst.display_help: Cosmic Burst smashes the target with cosmic particles. The attack is very short range, but the damage is devastating and can leave most targets Disoriented and with reduced Defense. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
Cosmic_Burst.display_target_help: You are disoriented and your Defenses are reduced.

Radiant_Aura.display_help: You can use Radiant Aura to heal some of your wounds, and the wounds of your group. This power has a small radius, so your allies need to be near you if they wish to be affected. Recharge: Moderate

Choking_Cloud.display_help: While active, you generate toxic radioactive gas around yourself. Any nearby foes may be overcome by the gas, leaving them choking and helpless. Recharge: Long
Choking_Cloud.display_target_help: You are caught in a Choking Cloud.

Neutron_Bomb.display_help: This devastating attack lobs an explosive sphere of deadly radiation, damaging the target and all nearby foes. Neutron Bomb can bypass some of a target's defenses and reduce the target's Defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Neutron_Bomb.display_target_help: The Neutron Bomb has reduced your Defenses.

Pulse_Rifle_Blast.display_help: This Pulse Rifle can fire a long range laser pulse. Deals moderate Smashing/Energy damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

Pulse_Rifle_Burst.display_help: This high powered laser pulse from your Pulse Rifle takes more energy to fire, but causes much more damage than a standard pulse and has a very good chance to send your foes flying. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

Photon_Grenade.display_help: Launches an Energy Grenade at long range from your Pulse Rifle. The energy from this explosion can Disorient some targets in the affected area. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Photon_Grenade.display_target_help: The Photon Grenade has Disoriented you.

Battle_Drones.display_help: Construct one to three Battle Drones (depending on your level) to do your bidding. Drones start out with only basic weaponry, but can be upgraded with heavier energy weapons. Drones can Super Leap. You may only have 3 Drones under your control at any given time. If you attempt to construct more Drones, you can only replace the ones you have lost in battle. If you already have three, the power will fail. Recharge: Very Long

Protector_Bots.display_help: You can summon one to two powerful Protector Bots (depending on your level). Protector Bots can defend your army by placing Force Fields on you and your allies. They can even be equipped to repair your other Robot Henchmen. Make no mistake though, the best defense is a good offense, and Protector Bots are well equipped with energy weapons. You may only have 2 Protector Bots under your control at any given time. If you attempt to summon more Protector Bots, you can only replace the ones you have lost in battle. If you already have two, the power will fail. Recharge: Very Long

Assault_Bot.display_help: Builds one massive Assault Bot. Simply put, the Assault Bot is a killing machine. There is nothing subtle about its weaponry. You may only have 1 Assault Bot under your control at any given time. If you attempt to summon another Assault Bot, the power will fail. Recharge: Very Long

Personal_Force_Field.display_help: The Personal Force Field is almost impenetrable to all attacks, even Psionics and Enemy Teleportation, although attacks from more powerful foes may get through more easily. Personal Force Field will also reduce the damage of any attacks that do get through. The Personal Force Field works both ways; while it is active, you can only use powers that affect yourself. Cannot be used with Rest. Recharge: Slow

Dispersion_Bubble.display_help: Creates a large bubble which protects all allies inside. While active, the Dispersion Bubble gives all allies within increased Defense against all attack types. The Dispersion Bubble also protects allies from Immobilization, Disorient, and Hold effects. Recharge: Slow
Dispersion_Bubble.display_target_help: The Dispersion Bubble is increasing your Defenses to all attacks and providing protection from Hold, Immobilize and Disorienting attacks.

Repulsion_Bomb.display_help: Projects an expanding Force Bubble around an ally that knocks down and Disorients nearby foes. This power cannot be used on yourself. Recharge: Slow

Dreadful_Wail.display_help: Your Dreadful Wail is so strong that most foes will be defeated by being subjected to it. Dreadful Wail deals massive damage to all nearby foes, although the damage does vary. Activating this power leaves you drained of Endurance, and unable to recover En
Dreadful_Wail.display_short_help: PBAoE, Extreme DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe Disorient, Self -Recovery
Dreadful_Wail.display_target_help: You have been Disoriented and your resistance to damage has been decreased.

Shriek.display_help: You let forth a quick Shriek, damaging your target, weakening their damage resistance and slowing their movement speed.
Shriek.display_target_help: The sonic Shriek has slowed your movement speed and weakened you. You are more vulnerable to damage.

Scream.display_help: Your Scream can cause serious damage to a target, while slowing their movement and weakening their resistance to further damage. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Scream.display_target_help: You are being buffeted by waves of sound and taking damage! Your damage resistance and movement speed has been reduced.

Shockwave.display_help: You can call forth a tremendous Shockwave that can knock down foes and deal some Smashing and Energy damage in a wide cone area. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate

Howl.display_help: A short range, but powerful sonic attack. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
Howl.display_target_help: The Howl has reduced your Damage Resistance.

Sonic_Siphon.display_help: By setting up a constant vibration within the body of your foe, you weaken his Damage Resistance. Affected targets will take more damage from successful attacks. Recharge: Slow
Sonic_Siphon.display_target_help: Your Resistances have been weakened by the Sonic attack.

Sonic_Barrier.display_help: This shield dramatically reduces the damage an ally takes from Smashing, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative Energy and Toxic attacks for a limited time.
Sonic_Barrier.display_short_help: Ranged, Ally +Res(Smash, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative Energy, Toxic)

Screech.display_help: By bursting forth with this hypersonic Screech, you can disorient a target. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow
Screech.display_target_help: You have been Disoriented and your resistance to damage has been decreased.

Liquefy.display_help: You unleash a barrage of sonic waves on the Earth itself, generating a powerful, localized earthquake. Most foes that pass through the location will fall down. The violent shaking also reduces their Accuracy and Defense. Recharge: Slow
Liquefy.display_target_help: The ground beneath you has been liquefied! You are stuck in sludge and taking minor damage. Your Accuracy, Defense and movement rates are reduced.

Barb_Swipe.display_help: Your Attack and Movement speed are reduced by the Spines. The Toxins may leave you immobilized.
Barb_Swipe.display_target_help: Your Attack and Movement speed are reduced by the Spines. The Toxins may leave you immobilized.

Lunge.display_help: Your Attack and Movement speed are reduced by the Spines. The Toxins may leave you immobilized.
Lunge.display_target_help: Your Attack and Movement speed are reduced by the Spines. The Toxins may leave you immobilized.

Spine_Burst.display_help: You can fling dozens of Spines in all directions. These Spines only travel a short distance, but they can deal moderate damage and poison any target close to you. Spine poison deals additional Toxic damage and Slows affected foes.
Spine_Burst.display_target_help: You are poisoned! Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.

Regeneration.display_help: You recover Health and Endurance at a faster rate than normal. This power is always on.
Regeneration.display_target_help: You recover Health and Endurance at a faster rate than normal. This power is always on.

Spine_Throwing.display_help: Your Attack and Movement speed are reduced by the Spines. The Toxins may leave you immobilized.
Spine_Throwing.display_target_help: Your Attack and Movement speed are reduced by the Spines. The Toxins may leave you immobilized.

Reconstruction.display_help: Heroes can concentrate for a few moments to heal themselves.
Reconstruction.display_target_help: Heroes can concentrate for a few moments to heal themselves.

Impale.display_help: Your Attack and Movement speed are reduced by the Spines. The Toxins may leave you immobilized.
Impale.display_target_help: Your Attack and Movement speed are reduced by the Spines. The Toxins may leave you immobilized.

Revive.display_help: Should a hero fall in battle, they can Revive themselves from the brink of death.
Revive.display_target_help: Should a hero fall in battle, they can Revive themselves from the brink of death.

Quills.display_help: While this power is active, you will constantly fire dozens of Spines in all directions. These Spines do minor damage, but can poison all foes in close range. Spine poison Slows affected foes. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Quills.display_target_help: You are poisoned! Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.

Ripper.display_help: Your Attack and Movement speed are reduced by the Spines. The Toxins may leave you immobilized.
Ripper.display_target_help: Your Attack and Movement speed are reduced by the Spines. The Toxins may leave you immobilized.

Punch.display_help: A Super Strength Punch is a powerful pummeling attack, and it may knocks foes off their feet.
Punch.display_target_help: A Super Strength Punch is a powerful pummeling attack, and it may knocks foes off their feet.

Hurl.display_help: You are able to tear up a chunk of ground beneath your feet and Hurl it at an enemy. This attack is close ranged, deals moderate damage, and can knock foes back. Damage: Heavy, Recharge: Moderate
Hurl.display_target_help: You are able to tear up a chunk of ground beneath your feet and Hurl it at an enemy. This attack is close ranged, deals moderate damage, and can knock foes back. Damage: Heavy, Recharge: Moderate

Temp_Invulnerability.display_help: When you activate this power, you become highly resistant to Smashing and Lethal damage for a short duration. Recharge: Very Long
Temp_Invulnerability.display_target_help: When you activate this power, you become highly resistant to Smashing and Lethal damage for a short duration. Recharge: Very Long

Unstoppable.display_help: When you activate this power, you not only become extremely resistant to most damage, but also to Disorient, Immobilization, Hold, and Sleep effects. Endurance recovery is also increased. Unstoppable costs little Endurance to activate, but when it wears o
Unstoppable.display_short_help: Self, +Res(Disorient, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, All DMG but Psionics)
Unstoppable.display_target_help: When you activate this power, you not only become extremely resistant to most damage, but also to Disorient, Immobilization, Hold, and Sleep effects. Endurance recovery is also increased. Unstoppable costs little Endurance to activate, but when it wears o
Unstoppable.display_target_short_help: Self, +Res(Disorient, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, All DMG but Psionics)

Haymaker.display_help: The Haymaker is a slow attack, but makes up for it with a greater damage and a high chance of Knockback.
Haymaker.display_target_help: The Haymaker is a slow attack, but makes up for it with a greater damage and a high chance of Knockback.

Unyielding.display_help: When you toggle on this power, you become Unyielding. You are resistant to Knockback, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, Disorient effects, and Smashing, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative Energy and Toxic damage.
Unyielding.display_short_help: Toggle: Self +Res(Knockback, Sleep, Disorient, Hold, Immobilize, Smashing, Lethal Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative Energy, Toxic)

Knockout_Blow.display_help: The Hero has hit you with a Knockout Blow. You are Held.
Knockout_Blow.display_target_help: The Hero has hit you with a Knockout Blow. You are Held.

Foot_Stomp.display_help: Heroes can use their superior leg strength to stomp the ground, quaking the earth itself. This is a localized attack against everything in melee range.
Foot_Stomp.display_target_help: Heroes can use their superior leg strength to stomp the ground, quaking the earth itself. This is a localized attack against everything in melee range.

Hack.display_help: You perform a standard attack with your Ninja Blade. This attack is slower than Gambler's Cut, but deals more lethal damage. Sting of the Wasp can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Hack.display_target_help: The Ninja Blade has reduced your Defenses.

Slash.display_help: You perform a quick slash with your Ninja Blade. This attack is very fast, but deals only minor lethal damage. This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast
Slash.display_target_help: The Ninja Blade has reduced your Defenses.

Shurikens.display_help: Three thrown dagger that can hit multiple targets.
Shurikens.display_target_help: Three thrown dagger that can hit multiple targets.

Slice.display_help: You swing your Ninja Blade in a wide arc in front of you, slicing multiple foes with lethal damage. This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit. If executed while hidden, all affected targets have a chance to be hit with a Critical for extra damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Slice.display_target_help: The Ninja Blade has reduced your Defenses.

Ninja_Reflexes.display_help: Activating your Ninja Reflexes enables you to be more evasive to melee, range and area effect attacks. This will increase your Defense versus melee as long as it is active. Ninja Reflexes also grants you resistance to Defense DeBuffs.
Ninja_Reflexes.display_short_help: Toggle: Self +DEF(Melee, Ranged, AoE), Res(DeBuff DEF), +Perception

Caltrops.display_help: The caltrops are causing minor damage to you and slowing your running speed.

Parry.display_help: You can use your Ninja Blade to parry incoming melee attacks and then quickly return the favor. Divine Avalanche does minor damage, but every successful hit will increase your Defense against melee and lethal attacks for a short while. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

Exploding_Shuriken.display_help: This small throwing star is rigged to explode on impact. You must have two other Weapon Mastery Powers before selecting this power. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Danger_Sense.display_help: Activating your Danger Sense enables you to be more evasive to melee, range and area effect attacks. This will increase your Defense versus melee as long as it is active. Danger Sense also grants you resistance to Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilization, Confusion, Fear, and Defense DeBuffs as well as resistance to Psionic damage.
Danger_Sense.display_short_help: Toggle: Self +DEF(Melee, Ranged, AoE), Res(DeBuff DEF), +Res(Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize, Confuse, Fear, Psionics), +Perception

Disembowel.display_help: You perform a powerful Soaring Dragon maneuver that deals a great amount of lethal damage, and can knock a target up into the air. This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Moderate
Disembowel.display_target_help: The Ninja Blade has reduced your Defenses.

Kuji-In_Sha.display_help: Kuji-In Sha invokes the power of Sha, or healing. Focusing your inner power, you can heal your body of its wounds and leave yourself resistant to the effects of Toxic damage for a while. Recharge: Long

Kuji-In_Retsu.display_help: Kuji-In Retsu is the mastery of space and time. Focusing your power on Retsu enables you to control your own time to easily defeat your foes. Mastery of this power enables you to avoid almost any attack, be it ranged, melee, or area effect. Your running speed, jumping height and Endurance Recovery are also increased. Retsu also grants you high resistance to Defense DeBuffs. When Retsu wears off, you are left drained of all Endurance and unable to Recover Endurance for a while. Recharge: Very Long

Head_Splitter.display_help: You perform a devastating Golden Dragonfly attack that deals a massive amount of lethal damage and can even knock a foe down to the ground and reduce his Defense. The power of this attack can actually extend a short distance through multiple foes. If executed while hidden, only some affected targets may be hit with a Critical, however, there is a chance you may land a Critical hit with Golden Dragonfly even if you are not Hidden. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
Head_Splitter.display_target_help: The Ninja Blade has reduced your Defenses.
